metadata.synopsis: Kansif is now safe inside Moonrise Towers after delivering us there.

0.speaker: Kansif
0.text: It was an honour to walk the shadows at your side. A little more inviting here though, eh?
0.context: NodeContext: formal, making a slight joke at the end

1.speaker: Kansif
1.text: Delivered, safe and sound. Don't forget us as you claw your way up the ranks, True Soul.
1.context: NodeContext: Smiling, hopes to be rewarded for serving us so well
